title: Thurs Post Show (04-21-22)
itunes:title: Thurs Post Show (04-21-22)
description:
Bobby talks about a feud he got into on Twitter yesterday. Eddie talks about his kids thinking he is on PlayStation all day. We talk a little about the Johnny Depp and Amber Heard trial. Bobby reveals his screen time on his phone and we are shocked by it. Bobby plays a new song they just wrote called “Nobody Cares About the Opening Act” that they will be playing this weekend.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
